thread.title: Paedophile banned from working with kids runs toy shop
thread.title_full: Paedophile banned from working with kids runs toy shop

title: Paedophile banned from working with kids runs toy shop
text: show ad Convicted paedophile banned from jobs involving children has run a toy shop at an indoor market for three years David Croft, 69, was given a three-year community order at Bradford Crown Court in 2010 for having downloading 39,000 indecent images of children He was again caught with 1,851 indecent images of children in 2013 He is banned from working in a job which could involve contact with children It has emerged that he has been running a toy shop in Halifax Borough Market
